column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This place is worth the hype! Even in the heat of Houston
column2: their ramen is so good and refreshing. Fresh noodles
column3: broth was filled with flavor. We had the fried chicken as an appetizer
column4: it did not disappoint. I ordered the #1
column5: the most popular ramen selection. No need to add any extra toppings. I'm in awe. Even though it's pretty pricey
column6: I think it's worth the price. Try to come one hour before or after the popular times because this place gets packed fast!
